name: BitcoinPrice
0:
”Alexa, open Bitcoin Price.”
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Price to tell me the Bitcoin cost in US Dollars.”
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Price What is the current Bitcoin price in Euro?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin price
des: This skill provides the current price of 1 bitcoin in your choice of currency from GBP/USD/EUR (more coming soon).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
